original_text: And Naomi said unto her two daughters in law, Go, return each to her mother's house: the Lord deal kindly with you, as ye have dealt with the dead, and with me.
korean_text: 나오미가 두 며느리에게 이르되 너희는 각기 너희 어머니의 집으로 돌아가라 너희가 죽은 자들과 나를 선대한 것 같이 여호와께서 너희를 선대하시기를 원하며

sentences.original_text: And Naomi said unto her two daughters in law
Go, return each to her mother's house
The Lord deal kindly with you
as ye have dealt with the dead
